verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: My heart is so proud, my mind is so unfocused

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: I see the things you do through me

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: As great things I have done

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines: And how you gently break me then lovingly You've take me

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines: And hold me as my Father

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines: And mold me as my Maker

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: I ask you “How many times will you pick me up?”

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: When I keep on letting you down

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: And each time I will fall short of your glory

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines: How far will forgiveness abound

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines: And you answer “My child, I Love You”

verse.name: c1f
verse.lines: And as long as you're seeking my face

verse.name: c1g
verse.lines: You'll walk in the power of my daily sufficient grace

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: At times I may grow weak

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines: And feel a bit discouraged

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines: Knowing that someone, somewhere

verse.name: v2e
verse.lines: Could do a better job

verse.name: v2f
verse.lines: For who am I to serve you?

verse.name: v2g
verse.lines: I know I don't deserve You

verse.name: v2h
verse.lines: And that's the part that burns in my heart

verse.name: v2i
verse.lines: And keeps me hanging on

verse.name: c1h
verse.lines: You are so patient with me Lord,

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines: As I walk with you I'm learning

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines: What your grace really means

verse.name: v3c
verse.lines: The price that I could never pay was paid on Calvary

verse.name: v3d
verse.lines: So, instead of trying to repay you I'm learning to simply obey you

verse.name: v3e
verse.lines: By giving up my life to You

verse.name: v3f
verse.lines: For all that You've given to me

verse.name: c1i
verse.lines: God's Grace
